/* eslint-disable react/no-unescaped-entities */ import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'reactify'; import { customColorCode, customClassCode, customThemeCode, simpleCode, sizeCode, } from './code-refrence'; import './link.scss'; import DemoCard from '../../components/demo-card'; const LinkDemo = () => (
A simple Link
small

medium {' '} default

large

{'style={{ fontSize: \'75px\' }}'}

Dark

A info Link

A warning Link
Danger

Success

); export default LinkDemo;
